common.description:
Ant Card yɛ open source resume editor, free, privacy-first. 
Nhwehwɛmu biara nni hɔ a ɛho hia, data nyinaa a wɔkora so wɔ mpɔtam hɔ, boa data backup ne export, hwɛ hu sɛ wo resume data no wɔ hɔ bere nyinaa.
common.subtitle: AI a ɛma obi kɔ ne ho so no, ɔde ne ho hyɛ mu.
common.title: Ant Kaad .

templates.title: Nhwɛsode ahorow .

cta.button: Fi ase de di dwuma kwa .
cta.description: Fi ase de Ant Card di dwuma mprempren de yɛ adwuma a ɛyɛ nwonwa a wode bɛsan ayɛ adwuma .
cta.title: Fi ase wo adwuma foforo ti .

items[0].answer:
Mprempren ANT kaad no yɛ nea wontua hwee, na edi mfitiase resume adebɔ ahiade ahorow ho dwuma. 
Open-source version no features no rensesa, na PDF export feature no bɛyɛ kwa bere nyinaa.
items[0].question: So Ant Card nni hɔ a wobetumi de adi dwuma?

items[1].answer:
Yiw, ahobammɔ kɛse. 
Ant Card de local storage di dwuma, a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wo data nyinaa sie w’ankasa wo device so a cloud storage biara nni mu, na ɛma wo ho yɛ kokoam ahobammɔ koraa.
items[1].question: So me resume data no yɛ nea ahobammɔ wom?

items[2].answer:
Mprempren yɛboa PDF export, hwɛ hu sɛ wo resume no hwɛ ma formatting a ɛkɔ so daa wɔ device biara so. 
Yɛayɛ nhyehyɛɛ sɛ yɛbɛboa export formats pii daakye.
items[2].question: Nneɛma a wɔde kɔ amannɔne ho nhyehyɛe bɛn na wɔboa?

items[3].answer: Yɛde JSON Configuration Export ma, ɛma wo kwan ma wode wo resume nhyehyɛe sie wɔ JSON format mu, bere biara, baabiara, wɔ afiri biara so.
items[3].question: Ɔkwan bɛn so na metumi ayɛ sync wɔ mfiri ahorow so?

items[4].answer: Yɛde customization options a ɛyɛ fɛ ma, a kɔla, nhyehyɛe, ne nea ɛkeka ho ka ho, a ɛma wutumi sesa wo resume style no sɛnea w’ankasa wopɛ ne nnwuma mu ahwehwɛde ahorow te.
items[4].question: Ɛyɛ nea wotumi sesa no dɛn?

ai.description: Smart Grammar check a wɔasisi no, a ɛkyerɛ nsɛmfua a ɛmfata ankasa, de adwumayɛfo nsakrae ho nyansahyɛ ahorow ma, na ɛma wo resume no da nsow kɛse.
ai.item1_description: AI no ara ma content expression yɛ optimise, na ɛma wo resume no yɛ professional pii .
ai.item2_description: Ɔno ankasa hu kasa mmara ne nkyerɛwde mu mfomso ahorow na ɛteɛteɛ .
ai.title: Smart detection, adwumayɛfo afotu .

preview.item1: Bere ankasa mu nhwɛso a ɛfa editing effects ho .
preview.item2: Nneɛma pii a wɔde kɔ amannɔne no mmoa .
preview.title: Nea wuhu no yɛ nea wunya .

storage.badge: Nneɛma a wɔkora so wɔ mpɔtam hɔ .
storage.description:
Wɔde resume data nyinaa sie wɔ mpɔtam hɔ koraa, ɛho nhia sɛ wobɛhaw wo ho wɔ kokoam nsɛm a ɛretu ho. 
Boa data export backup, hwɛ sɛ wo resume data no wɔ hɔ bere nyinaa.
storage.item1: Fael a wɔkora so wɔ wo mpɔtam hɔ .
storage.item1_description: San fi ase de data sie wo kɔmputa no hard drive so yiye .
storage.item2: Nneɛma a wɔde kɔ amannɔne pii .
storage.item2_description: Boa PDF ne JSON format a wɔde kɔ amannɔne .
storage.item3: Boa data a wɔde kɔ amannɔne Backup .
storage.title: Data ho banbɔ, kokoamsɛm kan .

features.subtitle: Yɛde all-in-one resume ano aduru ma na ama w’adwuma hwehwɛ akwantu no ayɛ mmerɛw .
features.title: Dɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ wopaw Ant Card?

footer.copyright:
2025 Ant kaad. 
Hokwan ahorow nyinaa wɔ hɔ.

hero.subtitle:
Ant Card de AI mfiridwuma di dwuma de boa wo ma wobɔ adwumayɛfo a wɔsan kɔ adwuma no ho nsɛm ntɛm. 
Nhwehwɛmu biara nni hɔ a ɛho hia sɛ wɔkyerɛw wɔn din, a wontua hwee, a data a wɔde sie a ahobammɔ wom ka ho.
hero.title: Ma resume adebɔ nyɛ mmerɛw na nyansa wom .

news.content: AI resume a ɛma ɛyɛ foforo foforo ne Live .
news.label: Kaseɛbɔ

icons.scholarship: Akwankyerɛ a wɔde ma wɔ adesua ho .

about.description:
Ant Card yɛ adwinnade a ɛyɛ adwuma ankasa kaad a wɔde bɔ ade a wɔde ama wɔn a wɔde di dwuma no ma wɔn a wɔde di dwuma no nya osuahu a ɛnyɛ den sɛ wɔde bedi dwuma na ahoɔden wom. 
Yɛgye di sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ obiara nya ankorankoro showcase card fɛfɛ, sɛ́ ɛyɛ adwumayɛ mmere anaa ankorankoro branding. 
Ɛdenam nyansa nhyehyɛe nhyehyɛe ne chrich template libraries so no, card creation bɛyɛ mmerɛw na ɛyɛ anigye.
about.title: Fa ho

diverseTemplates.description: Rich card template library covering business, creative, minimalist ne akwan foforo a wɔfa so di tebea horow ho ahiade ahorow ho dwuma.
diverseTemplates.title: Nhwɛsode ahorow ahorow .

featureList.responsive: Nsɛm a wɔka kyerɛ a ɛyɛ adwuma .

realTimeEdit.description: Wysiwyg editing osuahu a ɛwɔ real-time card effect preview, a ɛma w’adebɔ nhyehyɛe no yɛ nea ɛyɛ mmerɛw na ɛyɛ adwuma yiye.
realTimeEdit.title: Bere ankasa mu nsakrae ho nhwɛso .

smartDesign.description: AI-driven intelligent layout system a ɛma kaad no yɛ adwuma yiye ankasa, na ɛma w’ankasa wo nkyerɛkyerɛmu yɛ adwuma yiye na ɛyɛ fɛ.
smartDesign.title: Smart card ho nhyehyɛe .

hero.description:
Ɛnyɛ den sɛ wobɛbɔ ankorankoro kaad a ɛyɛ adwuma yiye na ɛyɛ fɛ a bere ankasa mu nsakrae, nsusuwso ahorow pii, ne nhyehyɛe a nyansa wom. 
Ma w’ankasa wo nsɛm a wobɛka no nyɛ nea ɛda nsow.
